entry.title: Multisignature for bip-schnorr
entry.summary: A developer named Nakagawa has written a multisignature procedure using bip-schnorr and has requested feedback on the same. The code can be found on Github at https://gist.github.com/tnakagawa/0c3bc74a9a44bd26af9b9248dfbe598b. The original documentation on multisignatures and threshold signatures using bip-schnorr can be found at https://github.com/sipa/bips/blob/bip-schnorr/bip-schnorr.mediawiki#Multisignatures_and_Threshold_Signatures.
